abstract: Job prospects have improved considerably for college graduates in class of 2015 following recession; applicant's success in finding jobs will be affected, however, by field of study and position sought.

headline.main: A Brighter Job Market, for Some

snippet: Career specialists and economists are upbeat about prospects for this year’s graduates. But not all job seekers have reason to be optimistic.
lead_paragraph: Career specialists and economists are upbeat about prospects for this year’s graduates. But not all job seekers have reason to be optimistic.
